import React from "react"; import logo from "../assets/smartfilter_logo.png"; import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css"; import InputData from "./InputData"; import { AppMode, RunMode } from "../App"; type SmartFilterLayoutProps = { mode: AppMode; setMode: React.Dispatch>; runmode: RunMode; setRunmode: React.Dispatch>; onSubmit: (inputData: any) => void; children: React.ReactNode; }; const SmartFilterLayout: React.FC = ({ mode, setMode, runmode, setRunmode, onSubmit, children, }) => { return (
{/* Top Bar */}
SmartFilter
{/* Core Section */}
{/* Left: SMILES Input only show upload button */}
SMILES Input
{/* Middle: SMARTS Input or presets based on mode */}
SMARTS Input
{mode === "expert" ? ( ) : ( )}
{/* Right: Runmode + Input/Output */}
Run Mode
{/* Input Column */}
Input
{mode === "expert" && ( <>
)}
{/* Divider */}
{/* Output Column */}
Output
{mode === "expert" && ( <>
)}
{/* Render children below inputs */} {children}
); }; export default SmartFilterLayout;
